channel.title: Stremio News
channel.description: Latest news and updates from the Stremio Blog

item.title: Stremio VR Released for Meta Quest Devices
item.description: Introducing Stremio in VR! You can install it on your Meta Quest 3, 3S, 2 or Pro device from the Horizon Store by searching for “stremio”. The Stremio VR app also supports new video types that no other Stremio app supports: all VR video types: 180, 190, 200, 220 and 360 degree all 3D video…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #41 – Stremio v5 and Stremio Web Updated
item.description: We just released a new version of Stremio v5 for Windows, and updated Stremio Web, let’s see what changed! Stremio v5 shell: More IPC events for window state (full screen, window restored) Fix opening external links Stremio Web (which is also the UI for Stremio v5): Player: add pause on window minimize setting (shell only)…

item.title: Introducing Stremio AI
item.description: We’re excited to unveil Stremio AI! Harnessing advanced artificial intelligence to tackle a fundamental challenge: distilling movie and episode plots into concise, accessible summaries. Stremio AI watches content for you, allowing you to reclaim valuable time for meaningful connections with loved ones rather than spending hours viewing everything yourself. Our AI creates comprehensive summaries of…

item.title: Stremio is now available on Philips TVs with TitanOS (models 2024+)
item.description: While Stremio has been available on Philips TVs running Android TV for a long time now, today we released Stremio for TitanOS! TitanOS is the new TV operating system running on 2024+ Philips TV models. The Stremio app for Philips TV is still new and due to limitations of this new OS it is currently…

item.title: Stremio v5 Playback Hotfix
item.description: A few hours ago users created bug reports regarding playback issues with the latest Stremio v5 update, we reverted the changes 1 hour ago while we could investigate the issues further. We have now deployed a hotfix for the bug, if you are encountering any playback issues with Stremio v5 on Windows you should use…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #40 – Stremio v5 and Stremio Web Updated
item.description: We just released a new version of Stremio v5 for Windows, and updated Stremio Web, let’s see what changed! Stremio v5 shell: Fixed update check and procedure Fixed sending visibility events when window is shown / hidden Added “quit on close” setting Stremio Web (which is also the UI for Stremio v5): Prevent navigation bar…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #39 – Samsung TV and LG TV Updated
item.description: We made an update to the Smart TV apps today. All the changes apply to both Samsung TV and LG TV apps: Fixed a case where the metadata preview area would be empty for continue watching items Improved load time and memory consumption Fixed a case where the navigation could get stuck when continue watching…

item.title: Stremio Tech Update #38 – Samsung TV and LG TV Updated
item.description: We made an update to the Smart TV apps today. All the changes apply to both Samsung TV and LG TV apps: Improved embedded subtitles / audio track label names Increased the contrast of the buttons in the video player Added more subtitle size options Fixed a bug for gamepad support on some TV models…

item.title: Android Mobile v2 Open for Beta Testing
item.description: It’s been some time since we updated the Android Mobile app, and for good reason as we completely rewrote the app from the ground up with newer and better technologies. Android Mobile v2 is now available for beta testing, the app will update only for those that joined the beta program. (there is currently a…

item.title: iOS TestFlight is Now Full
item.description: We recently announced (in the 10 Year Birthday post) that the iOS/iPadOS TestFlight has started, and we must now also announce the sad fact that all 10,000 seats for the testers have been filled. This means that no new testers can be added for the iOS/iPadOS app and that we will need to wait for…
